title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Competencies: Reinforcement Learning-Based Treatment Recommendation System Design for Diabetes Patients

context.prior_knowledge: Basic programming knowledge, foundational machine learning concepts, and general understanding of medical data analysis
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain fundamental reinforcement learning principles and apply them to MDP model design processes.
Learners can preprocess medical record data and convert it into state-action-reward structures suitable for reinforcement learning models.
Learners can design a personalized diabetes treatment recommendation system and implement it using Python-based frameworks.
Learners can develop and analyze reinforcement learning evaluation metrics reflecting medical domain constraints.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
